name: All is Suffering
summary: Using the giant statue as a medium, each of the five smaller heads encircling the statue’s main head simultaneously release streams of different elemental nature attacks.
technique: Summon and channel chakra into the Demonic Statue of the Outer Path.
Direct elemental chakra into each of the five smaller heads surrounding the main one.
Synchronize releases to project simultaneous elemental streams across a wide area.
training: Elemental sync drill: practice switching between two elements rapidly to prepare for multi-element casting.
Chakra partitioning: divide reserves evenly into multiple channels without collapse.
Focus endurance: hold five steady outputs for 30 seconds with consistent pressure.
tips: Only practical with external mediums like the Gedo Statue.
Extreme chakra drain—reserve for finishing maneuvers or overwhelming defense.
Coordinate with allies to cover downtime afterwards.

items: **Element/Type:** Wood, Fire, Earth, Water, Lightning, Wind (via medium)

markdown.text: Using the giant statue as a medium, each of the five smaller heads encircling the statue's main head simultaneously release a stream of a different elemental nature attack.

name: Allied Shinobi Forces Technique
summary: A massive cooperation jutsu devised by Shikaku Nara, combining the unique abilities of the Allied Shinobi Forces to restrain the Ten-Tails and coordinate an assault.
technique: Kumo-nin use Lightning Release: Lightning Illusion Flash of Lightning Pillar and Storm Release: Laser Circus to blind and obscure vision.
Suna-nin manipulate the dust cloud with Wind Release: Air Current Wild Dance.
Aburame clan and Kiri-nin deploy Insect Jamming Technique and Hiding in Mist Technique to impair sensory perception.
Iwa-nin use Earth Release: Great Moving Earth Core to sink the Ten-Tails.
Lava users spread quicklime, which Kiri-nin combine with water to harden restraints.
Sarutobi clan members heat the mixture into concrete, immobilizing the beast.
Alliance taijutsu squads, coordinated with Naruto, rush Madara and Obito.
training: Multi-squad timing exercises to synchronize elemental releases.
Telepathic coordination simulations for large-scale formations.
Stamina conditioning to sustain long-duration cooperative jutsu.
tips: Best used as a large-scale restraining maneuver to set up follow-up strikes.
Vulnerable to evolution or transformation of the restrained target.

markdown.text: A large-scale collaborative technique combining multiple elemental releases and clan abilities to restrain the Ten-Tails and enable a coordinated strike.
